longBusinessSummary: Pitti Engineering Limited manufactures and sells iron and steel engineering products in India. It manufactures electrical steel laminations, stator and rotor core assemblies, subassemblies, pole assemblies, die-cast rotors, press tools, high precision machining of various metal components, and machined casted and fabricated parts and shafts. The company's products are used in hydro and thermal generation, windmill, mining, cement, steel, sugar, construction, lift irrigation, freight rail, passenger rail, mass urban transport, e-mobility, appliances, medical equipment, oil and gas, and other industrial applications. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Pitti Laminations Limited and changed its name to Pitti Engineering Limited in May 2018. Pitti Engineering Limited was incorporated in 1983 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
